title: Maven: Windows not ANSI highlighting anymore
body:
### Describe the bug

Running the same project in Quarkus 2.16.6 and 3.0.0.Final I can see Ansi highlighting has been removed.

**2.16.6**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4399574/231811237-cb39eb6c-d00c-4690-9a88-469183adc72f.png)

**3.0.0**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4399574/231811404-3ffe5ecd-4bba-43bb-910d-bad5347219f1.png)


### Expected behavior

ANSI highlighting in `quarkus:dev` mode.

### Actual behavior

Not highlighiting

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.22621.1555]

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-17.0.6+10 (build 17.0.6+10)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.1 (2e178502fcdbffc201671fb2537d0cb4b4cc58f8)
